General.Name: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company
General.Description: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products to corporate and individual customers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers motor, medical, engineering, employee benefits, credit, fidelity guarantee, liability, and protection and savings insurance, as well as property and casualty insurance, such as fire, burglary, money, construction/erection works, liability, and marine. The company was formerly known as Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company and changed its name to Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company in October 2010. Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Safwa Commercial Building, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11481
